name: Pearls of the Oceans
description:
Challenge your mind and your dexterity in this Puzzle Runner Adventure.

Travel around the World to collect the Pearls of the Oceans to fight the pollution and prevent a war to begin.
Will you survive to the numerous traps and ennemies among 100 handcrafted levels?

For the most hardcore Players, complete each level with 3 Stars to claim your spot in the Leaderboard.

Learn about actions taken around the World to fight pollution while having fun.

Are you ready to accept this mission?

Good luck!
